channel.title: Game Pass on Gamefacts
channel.description: Recent content in Game Pass on Gamefacts

item.title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate is increasing by 50%
item.description: Microsoft announced today in a blog post that the price of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate will rise to $29.99 USD starting immediately. This comes just 14 months after the last increase in July 2024, when the subscription went from $16.99 to $19.99â€”marking a total increase of nearly 50% in just over a year.

item.title: High On Life 2 gets a February release date
item.description:
Squanch Games also released 42 minutes of gameplay. High On Life 2 is set to release on,

  • Windows
  • Xbox Series X/S (Game Pass included)
  • PlayStation 5

item.title: Hollow Knight: Silksong release date revealed
item.description:
Silksong is set to release on

  • Linux
  • MacOS
  • Windows
  • Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S (Game Pass included)
  • Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2
  • PlayStation 4 and 5
